ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p:
We thank Guorong Hu for participating in the design of our paper. She is from Department of Respiratory Medicine, Second Hospital of Wuhan. We thank Leike Zhang and his colleagues for assistance with the in vitro experiments. They are from State Key Laboratory of Virology, Wuhan Institute of Virology, Center for Biosafety Mega-Science, Chinese Academy of Sciences. We show our acknowledgments to the medical workers, people â€™s liberation army, community workers, police officers, volunteers on the front line. This work was supported by Novel coronavirus pneumonia emergency project, China (no. 2020YFC084430),
